title: So... was the fight between Lucian and Thresh from The Climb video the one that set Senna free?
body:
You know how Lucian had a clear shot at Thresh and how he yelled in the end with guns pointed at Thresh who was in the open?
Was it that moment when he broke the lantern, therefore Dark Passage being the PREQUEL of that fight? It's a far connection definetly, and who knows if it was just one of the random fights between the two.

I mean, it ended in a cliffhanger so...guess we will have to wait for Senna's trailer until we can get an actual answer from Riot.

replies.body: I believe the events of the Senna trailer happens right after the moment from The Climb. :)

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Pls,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=AWM6sF0g,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2019-10-16T08:30:07.653+0000)
>
> I believe the events of the Senna trailer happens right after the moment from The Climb. :)

Saw the trailer today, knew it.
Thanks for confirming this((tho the post was made BEFORE Senna's animated trailer was out tho)).

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Pls,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=AWM6sF0g,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2019-10-16T08:30:07.653+0000)
>
> I believe the events of the Senna trailer happens right after the moment from The Climb. :)

Does that mean the rest of the climb is canon too?

To be fair, its been implied that Lucian and Thresh clashed several times off screen, so it could have been one of these off-screen fights between them.

However its not sure if Lucian ever fought against Thresh in a 1v1 on the shadow isles(like in the video), so its deifinitely possible that it was this very fight.

> [{quoted}](name=GreenLore,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=AWM6sF0g,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2019-10-15T19:53:52.285+0000)
>
> To be fair, its been implied that Lucian and Thresh clashed several times off screen, so it could have been one of these off-screen fights between them.
> 
> However its not sure if Lucian ever fought against Thresh in a 1v1 on the shadow isles(like in the video), so its deifinitely possible that it was this very fight.

But it was never said that Lucian went to the Shadow Isles, and the Climb seems to be happening in the Shadow Isles.
Thats my point, from the story it definitely sounded like this is the first time that Lucian actually goes to the shadow isles, so if that is indeed the case, then it might be the same fight.

> [{quoted}](name=GreenLore,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=AWM6sF0g,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2019-10-15T19:53:52.285+0000)
>
> However its not sure if Lucian ever fought against Thresh in a 1v1 on the shadow isles(like in the video), so its deifinitely possible that it was this very fight.

Duh, when he had to blast his way through 1000 ghouls just to clap that waifu stealer.
OOOOOOOOOH I like this idea.... but then what happened to lucian, did he fall into the (water?) below? Tackle thresh? so many questions

Looking at the latest video, it seems to pickup right where the climb left of and Lucian stabbed the lantern to break it.

Which left Senna able to escape, although the lantern initiated self repair which made the other trapped souls unable to run with her while she held on thanks to some magic talent of hers.
That would make perfect sense ngl.
